aka: Father Arsenie Boca: A Man Of God

director.name: 尼古拉·默尔吉内亚努 Nicolae Mărgineanu

this_title: Parintele Arsenie Boca: Omul lui Dumnezeu
trans_title: Father Arsenie Boca: A Man Of God
introduction: Arsenie Boca (29 September 1910 – 28 November 1989) was a Romanian Orthodox monk, theologian and artist. He was persecuted by the Communists and named among the 100 greatest Romanians.
chinese_title: Parintele Arsenie Boca: Omul lui Dumnezeu
